name: Healthy Living Medical Camp
description: A comprehensive medical camp offering free health check-ups, blood pressure monitoring, and diabetes screenings. Open to all age groups.

name: Wellness for Women
description: Focused on women's health, this camp provides screenings for breast cancer, osteoporosis, and general wellness advice from top healthcare professionals.

name: Kids Health Check-up Camp
description: A free health camp for children offering vaccinations, dental check-ups, and nutrition consultations. Fun activities are also organized for kids.

name: Senior Citizen Health Camp
description: Specialized health camp for senior citizens focusing on heart disease, arthritis, and mobility check-ups, conducted by experienced geriatric specialists.

name: General Health Awareness Camp
description: An open-to-all health awareness camp offering free consultations, lifestyle advice, and general health assessments for the community.

name: Cardiac Care Camp
description: This camp focuses on heart health, offering screenings, consultations, and education about cardiovascular wellness.

name: Diabetes Management Camp
description: A specialized camp for managing diabetes, offering free glucose tests and nutritional counseling.

name: Dental Health Camp
description: Free dental check-ups, cleanings, and oral hygiene education for families.

name: Mental Health Awareness Camp
description: This camp aims to promote mental health awareness, offering workshops and one-on-one counseling sessions.

name: Nutrition and Wellness Camp
description: A nutrition-focused camp providing dietary advice and cooking demonstrations.

name: Eye Health Screening Camp
description: Free eye exams and consultations, focusing on preventive eye care.

name: Vaccination Drive Camp
description: A camp dedicated to providing vaccinations for children and adults, with a focus on community health.

name: Sports Physicals Camp
description: Offering physical exams for student athletes to ensure they are fit for sports.

name: Chronic Pain Management Camp
description: Educational sessions and consultations on managing chronic pain effectively.

name: Health Screening for Men
description: Health screenings tailored for men, focusing on prostate health and general wellness.

name: Respiratory Health Camp
description: Screenings and consultations for respiratory conditions like asthma and COPD.

name: Hearing Health Camp
description: Free hearing tests and consultations to raise awareness about hearing health.

name: Family Health Day
description: A family-oriented health day with activities, screenings, and health education for all ages.
